text:
The Mimmi series () is a children's books series written by Viveca Lärn (earlier Viveca Sundvall). The main character is Mimmi. She is a girl in late Kindergarten age and later in early primary school age. The books are told from the me-perspective. Many of them are written as diaries. The books were originally published between 1979 and 1996.
Mimmi lives with her family in Kungälv. Her father Oskar is a postman while her mother Elin is a waitress at restaurant "Gyllene Svanen".
Two television series based on the books have been produced. The first was "En ettas dagbok" from 1985 and the second was "Mimmi" från 1988.

annotations.surface_form: late Kindergarten age and later in early primary school age
